modShortDescription: Experience gain balancing is hard. This 7 Days to Die mod will help you a bit: Reach level 6 and now gain 10% more XP until you reach level 10.
modDescription:
Experience gain balancing is hard. In late game, it can really get tedious to farm XP – even if you have Claymore’s XP balancing mod installed. This 7 Days to Die mod will help you a bit: Reach level 6 and now gain 10% more [XP](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-experience/) until you reach level 10 (Up to 50% [more](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) XP).

Compatibility: A18+

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/c17i9l7stjmgexi/Claymore_Better_Attributes_Intellect.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
